column7: Zinka (1906-1989): via WCKR & Cantor Don Goldberg
column8:
MILANOV, Zinka (1906-1989): via WCKR & Cantor Don Goldberg, w/ ZM (a favorite of John Cone’s) in G. Verdi’s Requiem cond. A. Toscanini, rec. Milan, 1938; familiar arias from LA TRAVIATA W/ Jan Pearce & Leonard Warren From mid-1940s, w/ Jussi B.; in Nile Scene from Verdi’s AIDA, w/ Boris Christoff & Leonard Warren, two scenes from NORMA (NBC Symp.), incpl., WB 18, cont’d on WB 15
- -In 1950s, for 30 min, slightly incpl., WB 15MIXED DOUBLES (Australian), w/ Jas Duke, Andree Greenwell, Rainer Lin, Ross Bolleter, Arf Arf, Jon Rose, Caroline Winkins, Simone de Haan, Amanda Stewart (who gave me the tape), Herber Jercher, Ernie Althoff, Graeme Davis, Rodney Berry
Early Dada Poems, R.L.Q.S, Varie en 3 Cascades, SOUNDREEL, interview avec les Lettrists,

Includes: (Feb. 6, 1990, Spoken Music, w/ Dick Higgins' THE SOUND OF THE ANIMALS DYING THIRTEEN TO ONE (1959), Emmett Williams' FOUR-DIRECTIONAL SONG OF DOUBT FOR FIVE VOICES (1957), Anne Tardos' FOR BRIAN BUCZAK (1987), Jackson Mac Low's LOW ORDER TRAVESTIES (1989), John Cage's EMPTY WORDS (1979), MAC LOW'S THE HAPPY BIRTHDAY, ANNE, VOCABULARY GATHAS (1982), Higgins' QUARTET (1989), Emmett Williams' CELLAR SONG FOR FIVE VOICES (1959)
